title: What are some beautiful things that are actually quite horrifying? - Quora

response.answer_text: When hiking in Sedona last fall with my sister and brother, we came across a beautiful butterfly. We were taking photos and marveling at it. Upon examining it more closely, something seemed off. We were appalled to see that is was in its death throes, as it was being eaten by a very large (and pretty in its own way) spider.
